description: This file defines the NotesProvider class, a ChangeNotifier-based state management class for handling notes in a Flutter application. It manages loading, searching, adding, updating, and deleting notes by interacting with a notes database.

classes.name: NotesProvider
classes.description: A ChangeNotifier that manages the list of notes, search functionality, and CRUD operations for notes stored in the database.

methods.name: loadNotes
methods.description: Loads notes from the database, optionally filtered by a search query.

methods.name: setQuery
methods.description: Sets the search query and reloads the list of notes.

methods.name: addNote
methods.description: Creates a new note and updates the state with the latest list of notes.

methods.name: updateNote
methods.description: Updates an existing note's fields and persists the changes.

methods.name: deleteNote
methods.description: Deletes a note by its ID and refreshes the note list.
